item.title: Housewarming 2024
item.description: So after a long time, I decide to restart my blog program. In my daily development, I have a lot of thoughts and ideas, thus I will write some documents to record them. But I believe that sharing is the best way to learn. A specific example is cryptography, which means the closing source algorithm is never the safest. Only algorithms that have been vetted by the public are truly secure.
